notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: RAM performed study design, supervised the experimental work, carried out collection and interpretation of the data, literature search and wrote the manuscript; JMK performed the antimicrobial assays; OMN carried out the antioxidant assays; AK performed the cytotoxic assay; MFA carried out collection and interpretation of the data; AJA collected the medicinal plants; MK performed the GC and GC/MS experiments. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
